"aa ban sopi akke me para awuruddata podiwunta redi kallakwath aran denne kohomadayi kiyala man me kalpana kare" karunawathi kiwwe dawalwaruwe wawata gos redi sodana atharathureya...."ithin ban umbaa oya kawili pewili rahata hadanna dassaya wechchi,hadala dapanko tawume kadawalata kawum ,athiraha tikak.kiyak hari hoyaganna baruwaya""eekanam ehema thama,eeth ithin mulin piti sini tika gannawath maye athe kiyakwath naha nowa,kade mudalali apita dan nayata denneth naha,dunnath undage poliya gewwama kawili hadala labayak ganna baha akke "umbaata kiyakwithara thibbanam athida."rupiyal 10000 k thibbothnam kalamana tika ganna athiweyi maye hithe,thachchi aampanna tikanam maye gawa thiyenawa."ehenam waren ada hawasata praja shalawe thiyena ape samithiyata.umbaata me welawe udawwak ganna bari wena ekak naha......-------------------mathrukawata kelinma bahinne nathiwa podi kathawak liwwe wadeta aarambhayak widihata.me wage katha api kothekuth api ape jiwithawala ahala athdakala thiyenawane.ithin api ada kathakaranna balaporoththuwena kshudra mulya kiyana anshaye anthargathaya onna oya ihathasiddawunu kathabaha athule thiyenawa.lokaye boho ratawalata me kshudra mulya kiyana de aluth deyak wunata ape ratenam me naminma nathath issara kale patanma me kshudra mulyakramaya yampamanakata kriyathmaka wuna.lankawe samupakara wyaparaya patan gaththe gramiya dilindukama game janathawa thulinma athiwena wadapiliwelakin akamaka damime prayathnayak hatiyata.ithin kshudra mulya kiyanneth me wage dekatama thama.kshudra mulya kiyana deta godak nirwachana thibunath menna me widihata ee de saralawa dakwanna puluwan..."widhimath mulya aayathana wetha pahasuwen praweshaya wiya nohaki,adu aadayam labhi prajawage aarathika ha samaja thathwaya ihala nanwimata upakari wana ayurin sapayana kuda parimana mulya sewa lesa kshudra mulyakaranaya handinwiya hakiyi"tikak bara wachana thibbath katath pahadili athi kiyala hithanawa.meka kiyewwama kenekuta issellama enna puluwan gataluwa thamayi ayi kenekuta widhimath mulya aayathana wetha pahasuwen praweshaya wiya nohakke kiyala.eekatanam hethu godak thiyenna puluwan.api balamu ee monawada kiyala..widhimathmulya aayathana wala pawathna nithirithidurasthabhawayaadu mulya saksharathawayaananyathawaya thahawuru kirime gatalumulya aayathana walin prathikshepa kirimswayanwa hithamatha baharawimaonna oya kiyana hethu ekak ho kihipayak nisa samahara janathawa widhimath mulya aayathana wethin baharawela thiyanawa.godak welawata mehema wela thiyenne adu aadayamlabhi janathawa wima wisheshayi.lankawatath wada me thathwaya indiyawa ,bangladeshaya wani ratawala dakinnata thiyenawa.eekanisa thamayi nuthana kshudra mulya kramaye nawa nammak athikala bangaladeshaye gramin bankuwa athiwenne.mahacharya mohommad yunus wisin 1976 di mema bankuwa pihitawanne dilindu kamin pida windina eheth yamkisi aadayam uthpadanaya kirime hakiyawak athi janathawa wetha lihil surakum yatathe naya labadime wadapiliwelak samagayi.goda denek me kshudra mulya kiyana de aadharamudalak labadimak widihatath hithanawa.eya sampurnayenma waradi nigamanayak.meya kisisethma aadhara mudalaknam nemeyi.anek naya mudalak menma mewada nisikalata gewa nimakala yuthuyi.eheth wenath nayawalata wada kshudra mulya yanna wenaswenne ema mulya pahasukam magin eya labaganna janathawage aarthika thathwaya menma samaja thathwayada ihalananwimaaramunu karagena thibena nisa.ee wagema owunata daragatha haki poliyakata saha lihil surakum kondesi yatathe labadena nisa.wadath wadagathma karanaya wanne mema sanwardhanaya athikarawanne owun thulinma pananagina kriyawaliyak hatiyatayi.bangaladeshayata amatharawa indiyawa ,indunisiyawa wani ratawalath me kshudra mulyakaranaya itha sarthakawa kriyathmaka wenawa.

kanagarathnam jiwarathnam (handunumpath anka 752872937) namathi maragena marena puhunuwalath kalu koti prabalaya thrikunamala ambalipuramwalata malu wyaparikayaku men pamina sitiyadi thrikunamala kandawure nawika buddhi anshayata lada oththuwak matha kanagarathnam kotu wanneya.
